types.name: String
types.description:
The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8
character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to
represent free-form human-readable text.

types.name: Int
types.description:
The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric
values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

types.name: Boolean
types.description: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

types.name: RootQuery
types.description: The root entry point into the Graph

fields.name: applicationNote
fields.description: An object of the applicationNote Type.

args.name: id
args.description: The globally unique identifier of the object.

args.name: idType
args.description: Type of unique identifier to fetch by. Default is Global ID

args.name: asPreview
args.description: Whether to return the Preview Node instead of the Published Node. When the ID of a Node is provided along with asPreview being set to true, the preview node with un-published changes will be returned instead of the published node. If no preview node exists or the requester doesn't have proper capabilities to preview, no node will be returned. If the ID provided is a URI and has a preview query arg, it will be used as a fallback if the "asPreview" argument is not explicitly provided as an argument.

args.name: slug
args.description: Get the applicationNote by its slug (only available for non-hierarchical types)

fields.deprecationReason: Deprecated in favor of using the single entry point for this type with ID and IDType fields. For example, instead of postBy( id: "" ), use post(id: "" idType: "")

types.name: RootQueryToPaAirQualityApplicationConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToPaAirQualityApplicationConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ID
types.description:
The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to
refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON
response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable.
When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer
(such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

types.name: OrderEnum
types.description: Sort direction for ordered results. Determines whether items are returned in ascending or descending order.

enumValues.name: ASC
enumValues.description: Results ordered from lowest to highest values (i.e. A-Z, oldest-newest)

enumValues.name: DESC
enumValues.description: Results ordered from highest to lowest values (i.e. Z-A, newest-oldest)

types.name: TermObjectsConnectionOrderbyEnum
types.description: Sorting attributes for taxonomy term collections. Determines which property of taxonomy terms is used for ordering results.

enumValues.name: COUNT
enumValues.description: Ordering by number of associated content items.

enumValues.name: DESCRIPTION
enumValues.description: Alphabetical ordering by term description text.

enumValues.name: TERM_GROUP
enumValues.description: Ordering by assigned term grouping value.

enumValues.name: TERM_ORDER
enumValues.description: Ordering by manually defined sort position.

types.name: ScriptLoadingGroupLocationEnum
types.description: Script insertion positions in the document structure. Determines whether scripts are placed in the document head or before the closing body tag.

enumValues.name: FOOTER
enumValues.description: Delayed loading at end of document, right before the closing `<body>` tag. (allows content to render first)

enumValues.name: HEADER
enumValues.description: Early loading in document `<head>` tag. (executes before page content renders)

types.name: ScriptLoadingStrategyEnum
types.description: Script loading optimization attributes. Controls browser behavior for script loading to improve page performance (async or defer).

enumValues.name: ASYNC
enumValues.description: Load script in parallel with page rendering, executing as soon as downloaded

enumValues.name: DEFER
enumValues.description: Download script in parallel but defer execution until page is fully parsed

types.name: PostObjectsConnectionDateColumnEnum
types.description: Date field selectors for content filtering. Specifies which date attribute (creation date, modification date) should be used for date-based queries.

enumValues.name: DATE
enumValues.description: The date the comment was created in local time.

enumValues.name: MODIFIED
enumValues.description: The most recent modification date of the comment.

types.name: RelationEnum
types.description: Logical operators for filter conditions. Determines whether multiple filtering criteria should be combined with AND (all must match) or OR (any can match).

enumValues.name: AND
enumValues.description: All conditions must match (more restrictive filtering)

enumValues.name: OR
enumValues.description: Any condition can match (more inclusive filtering)

types.name: MimeTypeEnum
types.description: Media file type classification based on MIME standards. Used to identify and filter media items by their format and content type.

types.name: PostObjectsConnectionOrderbyInput
types.description: Options for ordering the connection

inputFields.name: field
inputFields.description: The field to order the connection by

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Possible directions in which to order a list of items

types.name: PostObjectsConnectionOrderbyEnum
types.description: Content sorting attributes for post-type objects. Identifies which content property should be used to determine result order.

enumValues.name: AUTHOR
enumValues.description: Ordering by content author (typically by author name).

enumValues.name: COMMENT_COUNT
enumValues.description: Ordering by popularity based on number of comments.

enumValues.name: IN
enumValues.description: Maintain custom order of IDs exactly as specified in the query with the IN field.

enumValues.name: MENU_ORDER
enumValues.description: Ordering by manually defined sort position.

enumValues.name: NAME_IN
enumValues.description: Maintain custom order of IDs exactly as specified in the query with the NAME_IN field.

enumValues.name: PARENT
enumValues.description: Ordering by parent-child relationship in hierarchical content.

types.name: PostStatusEnum
types.description: Publishing status that controls the visibility and editorial state of content. Determines whether content is published, pending review, in draft state, or private.

enumValues.name: AUTO_DRAFT
enumValues.description: Automatically saved content that has not been manually saved

enumValues.name: DRAFT
enumValues.description: Content that is saved but not yet published or visible to the public

enumValues.name: INHERIT
enumValues.description: Content that inherits its status from a parent object

enumValues.name: PRIVATE
enumValues.description: Content only visible to authorized users with appropriate permissions

enumValues.name: PUBLISH
enumValues.description: Content that is publicly visible to all visitors

enumValues.name: TRASH
enumValues.description: Content marked for deletion but still recoverable

fields.description: The position of this post type in the menu. Only applies if show_in_menu is true.

fields.name: name
fields.description: The internal name of the post type. This should not be used for display purposes.

fields.name: public
fields.description: Whether a content type is intended for use publicly either via the admin interface or by front-end users. While the default settings of exclude_from_search, publicly_queryable, show_ui, and show_in_nav_menus are inherited from public, each does not rely on this relationship and controls a very specific intention.

fields.name: publiclyQueryable
fields.description: Whether queries can be performed on the front end for the content type as part of parse_request().

fields.name: restBase
fields.description: Name of content type to display in REST API "wp/v2" namespace.

fields.name: restControllerClass
fields.description: The REST Controller class assigned to handling this content type.

fields.name: showInAdminBar
fields.description: Makes this content type available via the admin bar.

fields.name: showInGraphql
fields.description: Whether to add the content type to the GraphQL Schema.

fields.name: showInMenu
fields.description: Where to show the content type in the admin menu. To work, $show_ui must be true. If true, the post type is shown in its own top level menu. If false, no menu is shown. If a string of an existing top level menu (eg. "tools.php" or "edit.php?post_type=page"), the post type will be placed as a sub-menu of that.

fields.name: showInNavMenus
fields.description: Makes this content type available for selection in navigation menus.

fields.name: showInRest
fields.description: Whether the content type is associated with a route under the the REST API "wp/v2" namespace.

fields.name: showUi
fields.description: Whether to generate and allow a UI for managing this content type in the admin.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: The unique resource identifier path

inputFields.name: contentTypes
inputFields.description: The Types of content to filter

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific database ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: stati
inputFields.description: Retrieve posts where post status is in an array.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific status.

inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: Commenter

fields.name: avatar
fields.description: Avatar object for user. The avatar object can be retrieved in different sizes by specifying the size argument.

fields.description: Identifies the primary key from the database.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email address of the author of a comment.

fields.description: Whether the author information is considered restricted. (not fully public)

types.name: Avatar
types.description: Avatars are profile images for users. WordPress by default uses the Gravatar service to host and fetch avatars from.

fields.name: default
fields.description: TEST: URL for the default image or a default type. Accepts '404' (return a 404 instead of a default image), 'retro' (8bit), 'monsterid' (monster), 'wavatar' (cartoon face), 'indenticon' (the 'quilt'), 'mystery', 'mm', or 'mysteryman' (The Oyster Man), 'blank' (transparent GIF), or 'gravatar_default' (the Gravatar logo).

fields.name: extraAttr
fields.description: HTML attributes to insert in the IMG element. Is not sanitized.

fields.name: forceDefault
fields.description: Whether to always show the default image, never the Gravatar.

fields.name: foundAvatar
fields.description: Whether the avatar was successfully found.

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height of the avatar image.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: rating
fields.description: What rating to display avatars up to. Accepts 'G', 'PG', 'R', 'X', and are judged in that order.

fields.name: scheme

types.name: CommentsConnectionOrderbyEnum
types.description: Sorting attributes for comment collections. Specifies which comment property determines the order of results.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_AGENT
enumValues.description: Order by browser user agent of the commenter.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_APPROVED
enumValues.description: Order by approval status of the comment.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_AUTHOR
enumValues.description: Order by name of the comment author.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_AUTHOR_EMAIL
enumValues.description: Order by e-mail of the comment author.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_AUTHOR_IP
enumValues.description: Order by IP address of the comment author.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_AUTHOR_URL
enumValues.description: Order by URL address of the comment author.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_DATE
enumValues.description: Chronological ordering by comment submission date.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_DATE_GMT
enumValues.description: Chronological ordering by comment date in UTC/GMT time.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_ID
enumValues.description: Ordering by internal ID (typically reflects creation order).

enumValues.name: COMMENT_IN
enumValues.description: Preserve custom order of IDs as specified in the query.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_KARMA
enumValues.description: Order by the comment karma score.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_PARENT
enumValues.description: Ordering by parent comment relationship (threaded discussions).

enumValues.name: COMMENT_POST_ID
enumValues.description: Ordering by associated content item ID.

enumValues.name: COMMENT_TYPE
enumValues.description: Ordering by comment classification (standard comments, pingbacks, etc.).

enumValues.name: USER_ID
enumValues.description: Ordering by the user account ID associated with the comment as the comment author.

types.name: Comment
types.description: A response or reaction to content submitted by users. Comments are typically associated with a specific content entry.

fields.name: agent
fields.description: User agent used to post the comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_agent and the value matching the "comment_agent" column in SQL.

fields.name: approved
fields.description: The approval status of the comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_approved and the value matching the "comment_approved" column in SQL.
fields.deprecationReason: Deprecated in favor of the `status` field

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author of the comment

fields.name: authorIp
fields.description: IP address for the author at the time of commenting. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_author_IP and the value matching the "comment_author_IP" column in SQL.
fields.deprecationReason: Use the ipAddress field on the edge between the comment and author

fields.name: commentId
fields.description: ID for the comment, unique among comments.

fields.name: commentedOn
fields.description: Connection between the Comment type and the ContentNode type

fields.name: content
fields.description: Content of the comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_content and the value matching the "comment_content" column in SQL.

args.name: format
args.description: Format of the field output

fields.name: databaseId
fields.description: The unique identifier stored in the database

fields.name: date
fields.description: Date the comment was posted in local time. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->date and the value matching the "date" column in SQL.

fields.name: dateGmt
fields.description: Date the comment was posted in GMT. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->date_gmt and the value matching the "date_gmt" column in SQL.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique identifier for the comment object

fields.name: isComment
fields.description: Whether the node is a Comment

fields.name: isContentNode
fields.description: Whether the node is a Content Node

fields.name: isFrontPage
fields.description: Whether the node represents the front page.

fields.name: isPostsPage
fields.description: Whether  the node represents the blog page.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: isTermNode
fields.description: Whether the node is a Term

fields.name: karma
fields.description: Karma value for the comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_karma and the value matching the "comment_karma" column in SQL.

fields.name: link
fields.description: The permalink of the comment

fields.name: parent
fields.description: Connection between the Comment type and the Comment type

args.name: where
args.description: Arguments for filtering the connection

fields.name: parentDatabaseId
fields.description: The database id of the parent comment node or null if it is the root comment

fields.name: parentId
fields.description: The globally unique identifier of the parent comment node.

fields.name: replies
fields.description: Connection between the Comment type and the Comment type

args.name: first
args.description: The number of items to return after the referenced "after" cursor

args.name: last
args.description: The number of items to return before the referenced "before" cursor

args.name: after
args.description: Cursor used along with the "first" argument to reference where in the dataset to get data

args.name: before
args.description: Cursor used along with the "last" argument to reference where in the dataset to get data

args.name: where
args.description: Arguments for filtering the connection

fields.name: status
fields.description: The approval status of the comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_approved and the value matching the "comment_approved" column in SQL.

fields.name: type
fields.description: Type of comment. This field is equivalent to WP_Comment->comment_type and the value matching the "comment_type" column in SQL.

fields.name: uri
fields.description: The unique resource identifier path

types.name: PostObjectFieldFormatEnum
types.description: Content field rendering options. Determines whether content fields are returned as raw data or with applied formatting and transformations. Default is RENDERED.

enumValues.description: Content with all formatting and transformations applied, ready for display.

types.name: UserToMediaItemConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the UserToMediaItemConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific database ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: stati
inputFields.description: Retrieve posts where post status is in an array.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific status.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: HierarchicalContentNodeToContentNodeAncestorsConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the HierarchicalContentNodeToContentNodeAncestorsConnection connection

inputFields.name: contentTypes
inputFields.description: The Types of content to filter

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific database ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: stati
inputFields.description: Retrieve posts where post status is in an array.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific status.

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: MediaItemToCommentConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the MediaItemToCommentConnection connection

inputFields.name: authorEmail
inputFields.description: Comment author email address.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to include comments for.

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to exclude comments for.

inputFields.name: authorUrl
inputFields.description: Comment author URL.

inputFields.name: commentIn
inputFields.description: Array of comment IDs to include.

inputFields.name: commentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of status.

inputFields.name: commentType
inputFields.description: Include comments of a given type.

inputFields.name: commentTypeIn
inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: contentAuthor
inputFields.description: Content object author ID to limit results by.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs *not* to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentId
inputFields.description: Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object ID.

inputFields.name: contentIdIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentName
inputFields.description: Content object name (i.e. slug ) to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentParent
inputFields.description: Content Object parent ID to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentStatus
inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: statusIn
inputFields.description: One or more Comment Statuses to limit results by

inputFields.name: userId

enumValues.description: Medium image preview typically suitable for listings and detail views. (360x220)

enumValues.name: THUMBNAIL
enumValues.description: Small image preview suitable for thumbnails and listings. (140x220)

inputFields.name: author

inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.description: Specific database ID of the object

inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific status.

inputFields.name: authorEmail
inputFields.description: Comment author email address.

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to include comments for.

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to exclude comments for.

inputFields.name: authorUrl
inputFields.description: Comment author URL.

inputFields.name: commentIn
inputFields.description: Array of comment IDs to include.

inputFields.name: commentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of status.

inputFields.name: commentType
inputFields.description: Include comments of a given type.

inputFields.name: commentTypeIn
inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: contentAuthor
inputFields.description: Content object author ID to limit results by.

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs *not* to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentId
inputFields.description: Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object ID.

inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.description: Content object name (i.e. slug ) to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentParent
inputFields.description: Content Object parent ID to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: statusIn
inputFields.description: One or more Comment Statuses to limit results by

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

types.name: UserToPostConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the UserToPostConnection connection

inputFields.name: author
inputFields.description: The user that's connected as the author of the object. Use the userId for the author object.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: authorName
inputFields.description: Find objects connected to the author by the author's nicename

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Find objects NOT connected to author(s) in the array of author's userIds

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Category ID

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description: Array of category IDs, used to display objects from one category OR another

inputFields.name: categoryName
inputFields.description: Use Category Slug

inputFields.name: categoryNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of category IDs, used to display objects from one category OR another

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates

inputFields.name: hasPassword
inputFields.description: True for objects with passwords; False for objects without passwords; null for all objects with or without passwords

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: Specific database ID of the object

inputFields.name: in
inputFields.description: Array of IDs for the objects to retrieve

inputFields.name: mimeType
inputFields.description: Get objects with a specific mimeType property

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Slug / post_name of the object

inputFields.name: nameIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects to retrieve. Use slugs

inputFields.name: notIn
inputFields.description: Specify IDs NOT to retrieve. If this is used in the same query as "in", it will be ignored

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify posts whose parent is not in an array

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific password.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Show Posts based on a keyword search

inputFields.name: stati
inputFields.description: Retrieve posts where post status is in an array.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Show posts with a specific status.

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Tag Slug

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Use Tag ID

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag IDs, used to display objects from one tag OR another

inputFields.name: tagSlugAnd
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to display objects from one tag AND another

inputFields.name: tagSlugIn
inputFields.description: Array of tag slugs, used to include objects in ANY specified tags

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: Title of the object

types.name: PostToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ApplicationNoteToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ApplicationNoteToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ApplicationNoteToTermNodeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ApplicationNoteToTermNodeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: taxonomies
inputFields.description: The Taxonomy to filter terms by

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: PostToCommentConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToCommentConnection connection

inputFields.name: authorEmail
inputFields.description: Comment author email address.

inputFields.name: authorIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to include comments for.

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to exclude comments for.

inputFields.name: authorUrl
inputFields.description: Comment author URL.

inputFields.name: commentIn
inputFields.description: Array of comment IDs to include.

inputFields.name: commentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of status.

inputFields.name: commentType
inputFields.description: Include comments of a given type.

inputFields.name: commentTypeIn
inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: contentAuthor
inputFields.description: Content object author ID to limit results by.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs *not* to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentId
inputFields.description: Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object ID.

inputFields.name: contentIdIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentName
inputFields.description: Content object name (i.e. slug ) to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentParent
inputFields.description: Content Object parent ID to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentStatus
inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: statusIn
inputFields.description: One or more Comment Statuses to limit results by

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

types.name: PostToPostFormatConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the PostToPostFormatConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: parent

inputFields.name: search

inputFields.name: slug

inputFields.name: hideEmpty

inputFields.name: hierarchical

types.name: ProductToPaAirQualityApplicationConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaAirQualityApplicationConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaApplicationConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaApplicationConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaDisplayConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaDisplayConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaHumiditySensorOutputConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaHumiditySensorOutputConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaOptionalTempHumidityConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaOptionalTempHumidityConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaOptionalTempSensorOutputConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaOptionalTempSensorOutputConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaPressureApplicationConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaPressureApplicationConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaRoomEnclosureStyleConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaRoomEnclosureStyleConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaTempSetpointAndOverrideConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaTempSetpointAndOverrideConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.
