types.name: ProductToPaTemperatureSensorOutputConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaTemperatureSensorOutputConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToPaWirelessApplicationConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToPaWirelessApplicationConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: authorEmail

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to include comments for.

inputFields.name: authorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to exclude comments for.

inputFields.description: Comment author URL.

inputFields.name: commentIn
inputFields.description: Array of comment IDs to include.

inputFields.name: commentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of status.

inputFields.name: commentType
inputFields.description: Include comments of a given type.

inputFields.name: commentTypeIn
inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: contentAuthor
inputFields.description: Content object author ID to limit results by.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs *not* to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentId
inputFields.description: Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object ID.

inputFields.name: contentIdIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentName
inputFields.description: Content object name (i.e. slug ) to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentParent
inputFields.description: Content Object parent ID to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentStatus
inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: statusIn
inputFields.description: One or more Comment Statuses to limit results by

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

inputFields.description: Limit result set with complex set of taxonomy filters.

types.name: GlobalProductAttributeToTermNodeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the GlobalProductAttributeToTermNodeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToProductTypeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToProductTypeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ProductToShippingClassConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToShippingClassConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

types.name: ProductToTermNodeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the ProductToTermNodeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: taxonomies
inputFields.description: The Taxonomy to filter terms by

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToPaAirQualitySensorTypeConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToPaAirQualitySensorTypeConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: LineItemToProductConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the LineItemToProductConnection connection

inputFields.name: attribute
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute. Use the taxonomy name/attribute slug.

inputFields.name: attributeTerm
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute term ID (required an assigned attribute).

inputFields.name: category
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: categoryNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

inputFields.name: featured
inputFields.description: Limit result set to featured products.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

inputFields.name: includeVariations
inputFields.description: Include variations in the result set.

inputFields.name: maxPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price.

inputFields.name: minPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price.

inputFields.name: onSale
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is not in an array.

inputFields.name: rating
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific average rating. Must be between 1 and 5

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a keyword search.

inputFields.name: shippingClassId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific shipping class ID.

inputFields.name: sku
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

inputFields.name: slugIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific slugs.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status.

inputFields.name: stockStatus
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products in stock or out of stock.

inputFields.name: supportedTypesOnly
inputFields.description: Limit result types to types supported by WooGraphQL.

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag name.

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag ID.

inputFields.name: tagIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: taxClass
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific tax class.

inputFields.name: taxonomyFilter
inputFields.description: Limit result set with complex set of taxonomy filters.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

inputFields.name: typeIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: typeNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: visibility
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific visibility level.

inputFields.name: commentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of IDs of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of status.

inputFields.description: Include comments of a given type.

inputFields.description: Include comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: commentTypeNotIn
inputFields.description: Exclude comments from a given array of comment types.

inputFields.name: contentAuthor
inputFields.description: Content object author ID to limit results by.

inputFields.description: Array of author IDs to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentAuthorNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of author IDs *not* to retrieve comments for.

inputFields.name: contentId
inputFields.description: Limit results to those affiliated with a given content object ID.

inputFields.name: contentIdIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to include affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of content object IDs to exclude affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentName
inputFields.description: Content object name (i.e. slug ) to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentParent
inputFields.description: Content Object parent ID to retrieve affiliated comments for.

inputFields.name: contentStatus
inputFields.description: Array of content object statuses to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: contentType
inputFields.description: Content object type or array of types to retrieve affiliated comments for. Pass 'any' to match any value.

inputFields.name: includeUnapproved
inputFields.description: Array of IDs or email addresses of users whose unapproved comments will be returned by the query regardless of $status. Default empty

inputFields.name: karma
inputFields.description: Karma score to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field to order the comments by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent ID of comment to retrieve children of.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Array of parent IDs of comments *not* to retrieve children for.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search term(s) to retrieve matching comments for.

inputFields.name: statusIn
inputFields.description: One or more Comment Statuses to limit results by

inputFields.name: userId
inputFields.description: Include comments for a specific user ID.

types.name: GraphqlDocumentToGraphqlDocumentGroupConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the GraphqlDocumentToGraphqlDocumentGroupConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

enumValues.description: The Database ID for the node

enumValues.name: SLUG
enumValues.description: Url friendly name of the node

types.name: RootQueryToGraphqlDocumentGroupConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToGraphqlDocumentGroupConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: attribute
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute. Use the taxonomy name/attribute slug.

inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute term ID (required an assigned attribute).

inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: categoryNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

inputFields.name: featured
inputFields.description: Limit result set to featured products.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

inputFields.name: includeVariations
inputFields.description: Include variations in the result set.

inputFields.name: maxPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price.

inputFields.name: minPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price.

inputFields.name: onSale
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is not in an array.

inputFields.name: rating
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific average rating. Must be between 1 and 5

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a keyword search.

inputFields.name: shippingClassId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific shipping class ID.

inputFields.name: sku
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

inputFields.name: slugIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific slugs.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status.

inputFields.name: stockStatus
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products in stock or out of stock.

inputFields.name: supportedTypesOnly
inputFields.description: Limit result types to types supported by WooGraphQL.

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag name.

inputFields.name: tagId

inputFields.name: tagIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: taxClass
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific tax class.

inputFields.name: taxonomyFilter
inputFields.description: Limit result set with complex set of taxonomy filters.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

inputFields.name: typeIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: typeNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: visibility

enumValues.description: The Database ID for the node

enumValues.description: Url friendly name of the node

types.name: RootQueryToMultiplierGroupConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToMultiplierGroupConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToProductCategoryConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToProductCategoryConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: RootQueryToShippingClassConnectionWhereArgs

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

inputFields.name: attribute
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute. Use the taxonomy name/attribute slug.

inputFields.name: attributeTerm
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific attribute term ID (required an assigned attribute).

inputFields.name: category
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific category name.

inputFields.name: categoryIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of category IDs.

inputFields.name: categoryIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: categoryNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific categories by name.

inputFields.name: dateQuery
inputFields.description: Filter the connection based on dates.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

inputFields.name: featured
inputFields.description: Limit result set to featured products.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Limit result set to specific ids.

inputFields.name: includeVariations
inputFields.description: Include variations in the result set.

inputFields.name: maxPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a maximum price.

inputFields.name: minPrice
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a minimum price.

inputFields.name: onSale
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products on sale.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What paramater to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Use ID to return only children. Use 0 to return only top-level items.

inputFields.name: parentIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is in an array.

inputFields.name: parentNotIn
inputFields.description: Specify objects whose parent is not in an array.

inputFields.name: rating
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific average rating. Must be between 1 and 5

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products based on a keyword search.

inputFields.name: shippingClassId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific shipping class ID.

inputFields.name: sku
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific SKU(s). Use commas to separate.

inputFields.name: slugIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with specific slugs.

inputFields.name: status
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific status.

inputFields.name: stockStatus
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products in stock or out of stock.

inputFields.name: supportedTypesOnly
inputFields.description: Limit result types to types supported by WooGraphQL.

inputFields.name: tag
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag name.

inputFields.name: tagId
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific tag ID.

inputFields.name: tagIdIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIdNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tag IDs.

inputFields.name: tagIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: tagNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a specific group of tags by name.

inputFields.name: taxClass
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific tax class.

inputFields.name: taxonomyFilter
inputFields.description: Limit result set with complex set of taxonomy filters.

inputFields.name: type
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned a specific type.

inputFields.name: typeIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: typeNotIn
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products not assigned to a group of specific types.

inputFields.name: visibility
inputFields.description: Limit result set to products with a specific visibility level.

types.name: Theme
types.description: A theme object

fields.name: author
fields.description: Name of the theme author(s), could also be a company name. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Author" ).

fields.name: authorUri
fields.description: URI for the author/company website. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "AuthorURI" ).

fields.name: description
fields.description: The description of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Description" ).

fields.name: id
fields.description: The globally unique identifier of the theme object.

fields.name: isRestricted
fields.description: Whether the object is restricted from the current viewer

fields.name: name
fields.description: Display name of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Name" ).

fields.name: screenshot
fields.description: The URL of the screenshot for the theme. The screenshot is intended to give an overview of what the theme looks like. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get_screenshot().

fields.name: slug
fields.description: The theme slug is used to internally match themes. Theme slugs can have subdirectories like: my-theme/sub-theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get_stylesheet().

fields.name: tags
fields.description: URI for the author/company website. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Tags" ).

fields.name: themeUri
fields.description: A URI if the theme has a website associated with it. The Theme URI is handy for directing users to a theme site for support etc. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "ThemeURI" ).

fields.name: version
fields.description: The current version of the theme. This field is equivalent to WP_Theme->get( "Version" ).

types.name: RootQueryToUserConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToUserConnection connection

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of userIds to exclude.

inputFields.name: hasPublishedPosts
inputFields.description: Pass an array of post types to filter results to users who have published posts in those post types.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of userIds to include.

inputFields.name: login
inputFields.description: The user login.

inputFields.name: loginIn
inputFields.description: An array of logins to include. Users matching one of these logins will be included in results.

inputFields.name: loginNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of logins to exclude. Users matching one of these logins will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: nicename
inputFields.description: The user nicename.

inputFields.name: nicenameIn
inputFields.description: An array of nicenames to include. Users matching one of these nicenames will be included in results.

inputFields.name: nicenameNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of nicenames to exclude. Users matching one of these nicenames will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: What parameter to use to order the objects by.

inputFields.name: role
inputFields.description: An array of role names that users must match to be included in results. Note that this is an inclusive list: users must match *each* role.

inputFields.name: roleIn
inputFields.description: An array of role names. Matched users must have at least one of these roles.

inputFields.name: roleNotIn
inputFields.description: An array of role names to exclude. Users matching one or more of these roles will not be included in results.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search keyword. Searches for possible string matches on columns. When "searchColumns" is left empty, it tries to determine which column to search in based on search string.

inputFields.name: searchColumns
inputFields.description: Array of column names to be searched. Accepts 'ID', 'login', 'nicename', 'email', 'url'.

types.name: UsersConnectionOrderbyInput
types.description: Options for ordering the connection

inputFields.name: field
inputFields.description: The field name used to sort the results.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: The cardinality of the order of the connection

types.name: UsersConnectionOrderbyEnum
types.description: User attribute sorting options. Determines which property of user accounts is used for ordering user listings.

enumValues.name: LOGIN_IN
enumValues.description: Preserve the login order given in the LOGIN_IN array

enumValues.name: NICE_NAME_IN
enumValues.description: Preserve the nice name order given in the NICE_NAME_IN array

types.name: UserRoleEnum
types.description: Permission levels for user accounts. Defines the standard access levels that control what actions users can perform within the system.

types.name: UsersConnectionSearchColumnEnum
types.description: User properties that can be targeted in search operations. Defines which user attributes can be searched when looking for specific users.

enumValues.name: LOGIN
enumValues.description: The username the User uses to login with.

enumValues.name: NICENAME
enumValues.description: A URL-friendly name for the user. The default is the user's username.

enumValues.name: URL
enumValues.description: The URL of the user's website.

enumValues.name: SLUG
enumValues.description: Url friendly name of the node

types.name: RootQueryToVisibleProductConnectionWhereArgs
types.description: Arguments for filtering the RootQueryToVisibleProductConnection connection

inputFields.name: cacheDomain
inputFields.description: Unique cache key to be produced when this query is stored in an object cache. Default is 'core'.

inputFields.name: childOf
inputFields.description: Term ID to retrieve child terms of. If multiple taxonomies are passed, $child_of is ignored. Default 0.

inputFields.name: childless
inputFields.description: True to limit results to terms that have no children. This parameter has no effect on non-hierarchical taxonomies. Default false.

inputFields.name: descriptionLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the description is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: exclude
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude. If $include is non-empty, $exclude is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: excludeTree
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to exclude along with all of their descendant terms. If $include is non-empty, $exclude_tree is ignored. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: hideEmpty
inputFields.description: Whether to hide terms not assigned to any posts. Accepts true or false. Default false

inputFields.name: hierarchical
inputFields.description: Whether to include terms that have non-empty descendants (even if $hide_empty is set to true). Default true.

inputFields.name: include
inputFields.description: Array of term ids to include. Default empty array.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: Array of names to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: nameLike
inputFields.description: Retrieve terms where the name is LIKE the input value. Default empty.

inputFields.name: objectIds
inputFields.description: Array of object IDs. Results will be limited to terms associated with these objects.

inputFields.name: order
inputFields.description: Direction the connection should be ordered in

inputFields.name: orderby
inputFields.description: Field(s) to order terms by. Defaults to 'name'.

inputFields.name: padCounts
inputFields.description: Whether to pad the quantity of a term's children in the quantity of each term's "count" object variable. Default false.

inputFields.name: parent
inputFields.description: Parent term ID to retrieve direct-child terms of. Default empty.

inputFields.name: search
inputFields.description: Search criteria to match terms. Will be SQL-formatted with wildcards before and after. Default empty.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: Array of slugs to return term(s) for. Default empty.

inputFields.name: termTaxonomyId
inputFields.description: Array of term taxonomy IDs, to match when querying terms.

inputFields.name: updateTermMetaCache
inputFields.description: Whether to prime meta caches for matched terms. Default true.

types.name: ApplicationNoteCategoriesInput
types.description: Set relationships between the applicationNote to categories

inputFields.name: append
inputFields.description: If true, this will append the category to existing related categories. If false, this will replace existing relationships. Default true.

inputFields.name: nodes
inputFields.description: The input list of items to set.

types.name: ApplicationNoteCategoriesNodeInput
types.description: List of categories to connect the applicationNote to. If an ID is set, it will be used to create the connection. If not, it will look for a slug. If neither are valid existing terms, and the site is configured to allow terms to be created during post mutations, a term will be created using the Name if it exists in the input, then fallback to the slug if it exists.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the category. This field is used to set a description of the category if a new one is created during the mutation.

inputFields.name: id
inputFields.description: The ID of the category. If present, this will be used to connect to the applicationNote. If no existing category exists with this ID, no connection will be made.

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the category. This field is used to create a new term, if term creation is enabled in nested mutations, and if one does not already exist with the provided slug or ID or if a slug or ID is not provided. If no name is included and a term is created, the creation will fallback to the slug field.

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: The slug of the category. If no ID is present, this field will be used to make a connection. If no existing term exists with this slug, this field will be used as a fallback to the Name field when creating a new term to connect to, if term creation is enabled as a nested mutation.

inputFields.name: nodes
inputFields.description: The input list of items to set.

types.name: CreateCategoryInput
types.description: Input for the createCategory mutation.

inputFields.name: aliasOf
inputFields.description: The slug that the category will be an alias of

inputFields.name: clientMutationId
inputFields.description: This is an ID that can be passed to a mutation by the client to track the progress of mutations and catch possible duplicate mutation submissions.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the category object

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the category object to mutate

inputFields.name: parentDatabaseId
inputFields.description: The database ID of the category that should be set as the parent. This field cannot be used in conjunction with parentId

inputFields.name: parentId
inputFields.description: The ID of the category that should be set as the parent. This field cannot be used in conjunction with parentDatabaseId

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

types.name: CreateCouponInput

inputFields.description: The amount of discount. Should always be numeric, even if setting a percentage.

inputFields.description: The date the coupon expires, in the site's timezone.

inputFields.description: The date the coupon expires, as GMT.

inputFields.description: Determines the type of discount that will be applied.

inputFields.description: List of email addresses that can use this coupon.

inputFields.description: If true, this coupon will not be applied to items that have sale prices.

inputFields.name: excludedProductCategories
inputFields.description: List of category IDs the coupon does not apply to.

inputFields.name: excludedProductIds
inputFields.description: List of product IDs the coupon cannot be used on.

inputFields.name: freeShipping
inputFields.description: If true and if the free shipping method requires a coupon, this coupon will enable free shipping.

inputFields.name: individualUse
inputFields.description: If true, the coupon can only be used individually. Other applied coupons will be removed from the cart.

inputFields.name: limitUsageToXItems
inputFields.description: Max number of items in the cart the coupon can be applied to.

inputFields.name: maximumAmount
inputFields.description: Maximum order amount allowed when using the coupon.

inputFields.description: Minimum order amount that needs to be in the cart before coupon applies.

inputFields.name: productCategories
inputFields.description: List of category IDs the coupon applies to.

inputFields.name: productIds
inputFields.description: List of product IDs the coupon can be used on.

inputFields.name: usageLimit
inputFields.description: How many times the coupon can be used in total.

inputFields.name: usageLimitPerUser
inputFields.description: How many times the coupon can be used per customer.

inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

types.name: CreateProductCategoryInput
types.description: Input for the createProductCategory mutation.

inputFields.name: aliasOf
inputFields.description: The slug that the product_cat will be an alias of

inputFields.name: clientMutationId
inputFields.description: This is an ID that can be passed to a mutation by the client to track the progress of mutations and catch possible duplicate mutation submissions.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: The description of the product_cat object

inputFields.name: name
inputFields.description: The name of the product_cat object to mutate

inputFields.name: parentDatabaseId
inputFields.description: The database ID of the product_cat that should be set as the parent. This field cannot be used in conjunction with parentId

inputFields.name: parentId
inputFields.description: The ID of the product_cat that should be set as the parent. This field cannot be used in conjunction with parentDatabaseId

inputFields.name: slug
inputFields.description: If this argument exists then the slug will be checked to see if it is not an existing valid term. If that check succeeds (it is not a valid term), then it is added and the term id is given. If it fails, then a check is made to whether the taxonomy is hierarchical and the parent argument is not empty. If the second check succeeds, the term will be inserted and the term id will be given. If the slug argument is empty, then it will be calculated from the term name.

inputFields.description: This is an ID that can be passed to a mutation by the client to track the progress of mutations and catch possible duplicate mutation submissions.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: A string containing content about the user.

inputFields.name: displayName
inputFields.description: A string that will be shown on the site. Defaults to user's username. It is likely that you will want to change this, for both appearance and security through obscurity (that is if you dont use and delete the default admin user).

inputFields.name: email
inputFields.description: A string containing the user's email address.

inputFields.name: firstName
inputFields.description: The user's first name.

inputFields.name: jabber
inputFields.description: User's Jabber account.

inputFields.name: lastName
inputFields.description: The user's last name.

inputFields.name: locale
inputFields.description: User's locale.

inputFields.name: nicename
inputFields.description: A string that contains a URL-friendly name for the user. The default is the user's username.

inputFields.name: nickname
inputFields.description: The user's nickname, defaults to the user's username.

inputFields.name: password
inputFields.description: A string that contains the plain text password for the user.

inputFields.name: registered
inputFields.description: The date the user registered. Format is Y-m-d H:i:s.

inputFields.name: richEditing
inputFields.description: A string for whether to enable the rich editor or not. False if not empty.

inputFields.name: roles
inputFields.description: An array of roles to be assigned to the user.

inputFields.name: username
inputFields.description: A string that contains the user's username for logging in.

inputFields.name: websiteUrl
inputFields.description: A string containing the user's URL for the user's web site.

inputFields.name: yim
inputFields.description: User's Yahoo IM account.
